Here is some inline code `r 1+1`

``` {r starwars-plot, fig.cap = "A ggplot of starwars stuff"}
library(tidyverse)
starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = height,
      y = mass) +
      geom_point()
```

```{r starwars-tbl}
starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  select(name,
  height,
  mass,
  homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption = "A knitr table of starwars data")
```
